backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition serving as the backend entry point for the Internet Computer canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the addition of Google site verification meta tag to frontend/index.html with high confidence and associated test ID REQ-33.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components, hooks, and configuration for the UC Photography portfolio website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining color tokens, spacing, and design system values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags including Google site verification (3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7...), Open Graph tags, and LocalBusiness structured data schema.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles and renders all page sections (Header, Hero, Services, Portfolio, About, Reviews, BookingCTA, Contact, Footer, FloatingWhatsApp) in a dark-themed layout.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component with two-column responsive layout displaying photographer image with decorative gold border and UC Photography introduction text with scroll animation.
frontend/src/components/BookingCTA.tsx: Call-to-action section with urgency messaging and WhatsApp booking button linking to 7877283716 with gold gradient background and scale-on-hover animation.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with phone (7877283716), location with Google Maps link (25.039202,73.912804), contact form, WhatsApp button, and Instagram link (uc_photography_100) in dark card layout.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Fixed bottom-right floating WhatsApp button with pulse animation linking to 7877283716 with pre-filled booking inquiry message.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with logo, quick navigation links, contact info (phone 7877283716, WhatsApp, Instagram uc_photography_100), copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed header component with responsive navigation, scroll effects, and mobile menu toggle. Includes smooth scrolling to page sections, Instagram link, and a 'Book Now' CTA button.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component with full-screen background image, animated text reveal, and WhatsApp booking CTA. Features gradient overlay and animated scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/Lightbox.tsx: Modal lightbox component for viewing portfolio images with keyboard navigation (arrows, escape), previous/next buttons, and image counter display.
frontend/src/components/Portfolio.tsx: Portfolio gallery component with category filtering (Wedding, Events, Promotion, etc.), grid layout, and lightbox integration for viewing images.
frontend/src/components/Reviews.tsx: Client reviews section displaying testimonials in a carousel with star ratings, using shadcn/ui Card and Carousel components.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Services showcase section displaying six photography/videography service cards with icons, images, and hover effects in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook for managing Internet Computer actor instances with authentication, using React Query for caching and automatic invalidation when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: React hook using IntersectionObserver to trigger visibility state when an element scrolls into view based on a configurable threshold.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind configuration defining a black/gold/white luxury theme, custom animations (fadeIn, slideIn, zoomIn), scrollbar styling, and typography using Playfair Display and Inter fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom gold colors, shadows, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins for the luxury photography portfolio design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting a premium photography portfolio website with dark luxury theme, listing architectural decisions, contact details (WhatsApp: 7877283716, Instagram link, Google Maps coordinates), and implemented features for UC Photography & Film's.
